title: Spring Weather
subtle: Descriptive (nonfiction), 24 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR50L
description: Spring Weather identifies the different types of weather that occur in the spring. Repetitive sentence patterns and vivid photographs support early readers.
meta: clouds, comes, flowers, fog, rain, spring, storm, sun, wind
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Nouns : Recognize and understand that nouns are naming words
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and write the high-frequency words come, comes, and the

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
